lore: After discovering secrets for regenerating individual members of their species, and finding that they were unwilling to make choices about which of them should not stay alive forever, the Multitude are now boiling out into space, seeking new places to live out their many lives.

wild.description: As an ally, after encounter cards are revealed, you may play this flare. The value of each of your ships in the encounter is multiplied by the number of cards in your hand (not counting this flare) when counting toward your side's total.

super_flare.description: As a main player, after encounter cards are revealed, you may multiply the value of your allies' ships by 2 when counting them toward your total.
